ygData.subject: Misc Etc.  Was: Bone Chips
ygData.msgSnippet: This makes me wonder again what they ll have in Paineel, if / when they ever finish the thing. :)  I wonder if they re going to have a merchant there with bone
ygData.messageBody:
This makes me wonder again what they'll have in Paineel, if / when they
ever finish the thing. :) I wonder if they're going to have a merchant
there with bone chips? It would make sense.

Not to mention spells. I don't know about you folks, perhaps you like
it, but I don't like the thought of having to "research" all of the good
spells. Figured I could buy 'em from you other players. :)

Oh! This is just a bit of a side note. Perhaps all of you have already
done this, but awhile back I went to Odus and checked the location that's
supposed to lead to Paineel. There's a nice entry way to it, and a tunnel
going back into the rock. A couple of talking skeletons are in there that
complain "a skeleton's work is never done", and suggests you pick up a pick
and help them out if you hail 'em. Instead of loading, you find yourself
back several steps towards the entrance of the tunnel.

Heck, while I'm at it, I may as well ask here too. I'm looking for
people to tell me what the price is for the Thaumaturgist (sp?) robe. I
hear it goes for 70 to 80 plat. I'll be needing to know soon and I'm just
trying to verify this. Thanks!

~Steph
